thread.title: Ground News - Thief robs 3 Philly pet stores, police say
thread.title_full: Ground News - Thief robs 3 Philly pet stores, police say

author: Philly Voice
title: Ground News - Thief robs 3 Philly pet stores, police say
text:
Summary by Philly Voice Multiple Philadelphia locations of the pet store chain Doggie Style Pets have been robbed in what police believe is a targeted string of thefts by the same perpetrator. The crimes, which took place at three of the chain's locations, occurred between Dec. 16 and 24. Share menu More
